Title: Designates a portion of the state highway system as the Boston volunteer firefighters David Hadley, Eugene Schmitt, Dana Stevens and Donald Pfarner memorial bridge
Summary: Designates a portion of the state highway system as the "Boston Volunteer Firefighters David Hadley, Eugene Schmitt, Dana Stevens and Donald Pfarner Memorial Bridge".
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to designating a portion of the state highway system as the "Boston Volunteer Firefighters David Hadley, Eugene Schmitt, Dana Stevens and Donald Pfarner Memorial Bridge"
